generatedChannelPage.QA10Desc: 當你升級到高級訂閱企業版，你的頻道會出現專屬的「#標籤」頁面，你可以在此註冊專屬的主題標籤。當你提交的主題標籤經審核通過後，你便可以邀請其他用戶和粉絲點擊「立即參加」，一鍵參與話題，上傳多媒體互動內容，包括長影片、短片、照片和文章。
generatedChannelPage.QA11Desc: 你可以在社交媒體上分享你的主題標籤和網址來宣傳活動，還可一鍵下載活動二維碼，分享給粉絲或顧客。
generatedChannelPage.QA11Link: 想要了解更多主題標籤活動功能，詳見Premium頻道用戶手冊。
generatedChannelPage.QA11Title: 我可以怎樣推廣自己的主題標籤活動？
generatedChannelPage.QA12Desc: 你可以置頂主題標籤頁的優秀用戶內容，或隱藏負面内容，與參與者進行深度互動。
generatedChannelPage.QA12Title: 我如何管理企業版頻道的主題標籤頁內容？
generatedChannelPage.QA13Desc: 升級到企業版後，你的觀眾可以在影片播放器點擊CC圖標，觀看高質量的多語種自動字幕。你也可以到「創作中心」的「內容」選單中，點擊影片下方的「字幕」圖標，對字幕進行下載或編輯。
generatedChannelPage.QA13Title: 如何在我的影片添加多語種字幕？
generatedChannelPage.QA14Desc: 升級到企業版後，在「創作中心」的「內容」選單，選擇「直播」然後點擊「新增」，安排你的直播時間。
generatedChannelPage.QA14Link: 想要了解更多主題標籤活動功能，詳見Premium頻道用戶手冊。
generatedChannelPage.QA15Desc: 你可以訪問「購買和訂閱」頁面來取消訂閱，你也可以隨時再次訂閱GJW Premium。
generatedChannelPage.QA1Desc:
您可選擇以下高級訂閱訂閱方案：

高級訂閱個人版：$3.99/月 或 $36/年
GJW+ 影視：$6.99/月 或 $58/年
無廣告版GJW+ 影視：$9.99/月 或 $88/年
高級訂閱企業版（標準版）：$99/月，或 $708/年
高級訂閱企業版（進階版）：$199/月，或 $1,428/年
高級訂閱企業版（專業版）：$299/月，或 $2,148/年
generatedChannelPage.QA1Title: GJW Premium（高級訂閱）有哪些訂閱方案？價格如何？
generatedChannelPage.QA2Desc: 歡迎加入！ 如果你是新訂閱者，請點選上面的「立即訂閱」按鈕，按流程選擇適合你的高級訂閱方案，即可享受相應的訂閱權益和功能！
generatedChannelPage.QA2Title: 如何購買GJW 高級訂閱？
generatedChannelPage.QA3Desc: 你可以盡情享受無視頻廣告的乾淨世界視頻。如果你還訂閱了GJW+影視，更可以觀看零廣告的電影和電視劇。你還可以無限次創建投票和收藏列表，同時解鎖更多訂戶尊享貼紙。
generatedChannelPage.QA3Title: 高級訂閱個人版包含哪些功能？
generatedChannelPage.QA4Desc: 你可以觀看訂閱專享的高質量電影和電視劇。部份「購買或租看」的電影和電視劇不包含在此計劃內。
generatedChannelPage.QA4Title: 訂閱GJW+影視包含哪些服務？
generatedChannelPage.QA5Desc: 前往GJW+影視專頁，即可飽覽所有訂閱尊享電影和電視劇。並非全部電影或電視劇都能在你所在的國家或地區播放（通常是由於影片授權問題）。
generatedChannelPage.QA5Title: 我在哪裡能觀看GJW+影視的內容？
generatedChannelPage.QA6Desc: 訂閱無廣告版GJW+影視，讓你即時解鎖高級訂閱個人版和GJW+影視的所有權益和功能。
generatedChannelPage.QA6Title: 無廣告版GJW+ 影視訂閱方案是甚麼？有哪些權益？
generatedChannelPage.QA7Desc: 前往高級訂閱頁面（點擊乾淨世界首頁右上角的折疊選單），你便能夠看到你當前的訂閱方案和升級選項。選擇升級方案並選擇「更改計劃」。確認變更後，您的訂閱方案將會更新。
generatedChannelPage.QA7Title: 如果我已經訂閱高級訂閱個人版，我該如何購買GJW+ 影視計劃呢？
generatedChannelPage.QA8Desc: 當你升級到高級訂閱企業版後，你可以在頻道創建多媒體主題標籤頁，最多註冊擁有五個獨一無二的主題標籤。您的頻道將在乾淨世界享有更大的曝光度。您的高級企業頻道還將配備多語言自動字幕、無限量直播和直播即時字幕。該計劃還包含高級訂閱個人版的所有功能（無廣告和 GJW+影視）！
generatedChannelPage.QA8Title: 高級訂閱企業版包含哪些功能？
generatedChannelPage.QA9Desc:
目前GJW高級訂閱和GJW+影視已經可以在下列地區訂閱：

澳洲、奧地利、比利時、保加利亞、加拿大、克羅地亞、塞浦路斯、捷克共和國、丹麥、愛沙尼亞、芬蘭、法國、德國、希臘、香港、匈牙利、愛爾蘭、意大利、日本、拉脫維亞、立陶宛、盧森堡、馬爾他、荷蘭、 波蘭、葡萄牙、羅馬尼亞、斯洛伐克共和國、斯洛維尼亞、南韓、西班牙、瑞典、台灣、英格蘭、蘇格蘭、威爾士、美國、越南。
generatedChannelPage.QA9Title: 哪些國家地區可以購買GJW高級訂閱和GJW+影視？

forgetMe.ConfirmDialogDesc: 請再次登入以確認您要求註銷帳號並刪除個人信息。請閱讀我們的隱私權政策以及服務條款以獲取關於Forget Me請求會對您的帳號產生哪些影響。

forgetMe.ReqDialogDesc: 您可以隨時通過提交Forget Me 請求刪除您在GJW的個人數據。一旦您的Forget Me 請求被確認，您的帳號會被鎖定。您將不能再使用相同的帳號登錄，並且不能再觀看您已有的訂閱節目。Forget Me 請求提交後30天內，您可以選擇恢復帳號。使用帳號密碼在登入頁面登入網站，在彈出的對話框中選擇「恢復我的帳號」。如果您沒有在30天內恢復帳號， 您的個人帳號及個人數據將在這之後的120天內從系統中刪除。我們可能會保留法律要求的部分數據，如交易記錄等。
forgetMe.ReqDialogDesc2: 請選擇您提交Forget Me請求的原因，您的答案會幫助我們提升服務品質。
forgetMe.ReqDialogDesc3: 您也可以通過發送郵件至 help@ganjingworld.com 提交Forget Me 請求
forgetMe.ReqDialogInputPlaceholder: 您的反饋會幫助我們了解您的顧慮。我們可能會聯繫您。
forgetMe.ReqDialogOpt1: 對個人信息和隱私有顧慮

forgetMe.SubsDialogDesc3: 如果您有任何問題，請聯絡客戶支援獲得協助。Email: help@ganjingworld.com
forgetMe.accLockedDesc: 因為您提交的Forget Me 請求，該帳號已經被鎖定。如果您想取消該請求並恢復帳號，請點擊恢復帳號按鈕。提交Forget Me請求後30天內您可以申請恢復帳號。

header.branding: 乾淨世界致力於加強人與人之間的善意、尊重和信任。非成癮演算法，優先推薦有價值的資訊和內容。保護言論自由，保護隱私，無需註冊下載應用、分享和發表評論。

text.campusSEOTitle: 乾淨校園 - 寓教於樂的線上學習平台
text.campusSEODesc: 乾淨校園 — 安全的學習與觀影平台。結合 GJW+ 兒童系列及豐富學習資源，適用於手機、電腦和電視裝置。為教師提供免費資源，營造互助班級。秉持乾淨世界使命，致力於加強人與人之間的善意、尊重和信任。採用非成癮性演算法，優先推薦有價值的內容。
text.campusSEOKeywords: 乾淨校園, 乾淨世界, 學習平台, 網上課程, 影視, 學習APP, 教育工具, 非成癮演算法
text.kindnessSEODesc: #KindnessIsCool 善良很酷影片獎，鼓勵創作者、社會各界、團體和學校，透過鏡頭紀錄身邊的好人好事，在日常生活中傳播善良的種子！使用活動標籤#KindnessIsCool分享視頻，更有機會贏得$10,000美元大獎。
text.kindnessSEOKeywords: #KindnessIsCool, 善良很酷影片獎, 與善同行, 乾淨世界, 乾淨校園, 善舉, 好人好事, 影片創作比賽

text.howDoesItWork: 這種全新的登錄方式是如何運作的？
text.limitationDesc: 「密鑰對」的驗證目前只支持使用註冊時的設備登入帳戶。未來我們將增加支持多設備多平台的登入。
text.whatDesc1: 當您註冊新帳戶時，大多數網站都會要求您提供電子郵件並設置一組密碼。帳號和密碼會被儲存在網站的數據庫或是像Google這樣的第三方認證伺服器中。
text.whatDesc2: 在乾淨世界，用戶可以使用「密鑰對」進行註冊和登錄，無需提供郵箱，也不需要設置密碼, 用戶不再需要提供電子郵件和密碼即可登錄上傳視頻。
text.whatList1: 在您使用乾淨世界瀏覽器註冊帳號時，瀏覽器會為您生成一對安全密鑰。這對密鑰包含一個公開密鑰作為加密使用和一個私有密鑰作為解密使用。私鑰儲存在您的個人設備上，不會外洩；公鑰會通過互聯網傳輸到乾淨世界網站作為您的ID儲存。
text.whatList2: 登入時，乾淨瀏覽器會使用您個人設備上的私鑰來解密乾淨世界網站生成的一個安全令牌來完成驗證。這個安全令牌由您的公鑰加密，只能被相應的私鑰解密。即使未經授權的第三方或是黑客從乾淨世界獲取了您的ID/公鑰也不會對您的帳戶構成威脅，因為他們沒有所需的私鑰來完成身份驗證。
text.whatList3: 通過「密鑰對」進行身份驗證更為安全，原因如下：
text.whatList3-1: 身份驗證的核心部分(私有密鑰) 只儲存在您自己的設備上，極大地減少了未經授權訪問的風險。
text.whatList3-2: 身份驗證和數據存儲不涉及任何個人信息，保護了用戶隱私
text.whatList3-3: 無需記憶密碼，簡化了登入流程
text.whatListNote: 我們相信這種新的身份驗證方法將成為未來互聯網安全的基石。

generatedChannelPage.QA10Desc: After upgrading to Premium Business, go to “My Channel” and you will find a new “#Hashtags” tab. Click on the tab to register your unique hashtag(s). After the hashtag(s) submitted are approved, they will appear on your channel. Invite other users to submit multi-format content (videos, shorts, photos and articles) simply by clicking the “Join Now” button.
generatedChannelPage.QA10Title: How do you create an Owner Hashtag?
generatedChannelPage.QA11Desc: Promote your hashtag event by sharing your unique hashtag page and URL on social media. In addition, download your hashtag event QR code to share with your audience.
generatedChannelPage.QA11Link: Learn more about hashtag events in the Premium Channel User Handbook
generatedChannelPage.QA11Title: How do I promote my hashtag event?
generatedChannelPage.QA12Desc: Manage your content by pinning best entries or hiding negative content. In this way you can curate the most meaningful interactions happening on your channel.
generatedChannelPage.QA12Title: How can I curate and manage content on my Owner Hashtag page?
generatedChannelPage.QA13Desc: After upgrading to Premium, your viewers can watch your videos with high quality auto-captions in multiple languages simply by clicking on the "CC" icon in the video player. You can go to your “Creator Studio” and click “subtitles” under your videos to download or edit your captions.
generatedChannelPage.QA13Title: How do I add auto-captions to my videos?
generatedChannelPage.QA14Desc: Navigate to your Creator Studio. In the Contents tab, select "Live Stream", and click "Add New" to schedule a livestream session.
generatedChannelPage.QA14Link: Learn more about live streaming on GJW in the Premium Channel User Handbook
generatedChannelPage.QA14Title: How do I create a live stream?
generatedChannelPage.QA15Desc: Cancel your premium channel subscription at any time by visiting the Subscriptions & Purchases page. You can rejoin GJW premium at any time.
generatedChannelPage.QA15Title: How can I cancel my premium channel subscription?
generatedChannelPage.QA1Desc:
Choose between the following GJW Premium plans:

GJW Premium Individual for $3.99/month or $36/year
GJW+ Streaming for $6.99/month or $58/year
GJW+ Streaming Ad-free for $9.99/month or $88/year
GJW Premium Business Basic for $99/month, or $708/year
GJW Premium Business Plus for $199/month, or $1,428/year
GJW Premium Business Pro for $299/month, or $2,148/year
generatedChannelPage.QA1Title: What are the different GJW Premium plans available and how much do they cost?
generatedChannelPage.QA2Desc: Welcome aboard! If you are a new subscriber, click the “Subscribe Now” button above and follow the process to choose the right GJW Premium plan for you and start enjoying all the content and features!
generatedChannelPage.QA2Title: How do I sign up for a GJW Premium plan?
generatedChannelPage.QA3Desc: Upgrading to GJW Premium Individual allows you to watch content without video ads on Gan Jing World. If you have subscribed to GJW+ Streaming, you can also watch movies and TV shows ad-free. Additional features include creating unlimited polls and collections, and leveraging premium stickers and post backgrounds.
generatedChannelPage.QA3Title: What’s included with GJW Premium Individual?
generatedChannelPage.QA4Desc:
With the GJW+ subscription, you have access to subscribers-only premium movies and TV shows.
(Please note, movies and shows categorized 'Buy or Rent' are not included in the plan.)
generatedChannelPage.QA4Title: What’s included with the GJW+ Streaming subscription?
generatedChannelPage.QA5Desc: You can find the movies and TV shows available for subscribers by clicking your account icon, then going to “Subscriptions & Purchases”, or via the “Subscribed” tab on GJW+. Please note, some movies or shows may not be available in your country/region, usually due to licensing rights.
generatedChannelPage.QA5Title: Where can I watch GJW+ Streaming content?
generatedChannelPage.QA6Desc: Subscribing to the GJW+ Ad-Free plan unlocks all benefits and features for both GJW Premium Individual and Premium GJW+ Streaming.
generatedChannelPage.QA6Title: How does the GJW+ Ad-Free plan work?
generatedChannelPage.QA7Desc: Go to the “GJW Premium” page, accessible via the “hamburger” or menu button on the homepage, and you will be able to see your current plan and upgrade options. Choose the desired plan and select “Change plan”. After confirming the changes, your account will be updated to the new plan.
generatedChannelPage.QA7Title: If I have already subscribed to GJW Premium Individual, how do I subscribe to GJW+ plans instead?
generatedChannelPage.QA8Desc: By upgrading to GJW Premium Business, unlock Owner Hashtag pages with multi-format content aggregation for your channel and own up to 5 owner hashtags. Your channel will enjoy higher visibility and priority on Gan Jing World. Your Premium Business channel will also be equipped with multilingual auto-captions, enabled for unlimited live streaming, and live auto-captions. The best news? All features from GJW Premium Individual (ad-free and GJW+ Streaming) are included!
generatedChannelPage.QA8Title: What’s included with GJW Premium Business?
generatedChannelPage.QA9Desc:
GJW Premium and GJW+ are available in the following countries/regions:

Australia, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Canada, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovak Republic, Slovenia, South Korea, Spain, Sweden, Taiwan, United Kingdom, United States, Vietnam.
generatedChannelPage.QA9Title: What are the available locations for premium memberships and GJW+?

forgetMe.CompDialogDesc: Your Forget Me request is now completed. Your account is now locked. Any active subscriptions have been canceled. You may choose to recover your account in the next 30 days by signing into your account and clicking the RECOVER MY ACCOUNT button. After that, your account and personal data will be removed from our system within the next 120 days. However, we may retain certain information as required by law or relating to important business needs, such as your prior transaction history for financial reporting purposes, as well as certain information to comply with law enforcement or court orders or other ongoing legal processes.
forgetMe.ConfirmDialogDesc: We are sorry to see you go. Please sign in again to confirm your request to disable your account and erase your personal data from the system. Please read our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use to understand the impact on your account.
forgetMe.ConfirmDialogDesc3: Your account uses a third-party login. Please sign in below:
forgetMe.ReqDialogDesc: You can request to erase your personal data at any time or for any reason by submiting a FORGET ME request. Once your FORGET ME request is confirmed, your account will be locked. You will not be able to access your account or any subscriptions that you may have. For the first 30 days after confirming your FORGET ME request, you can choose to resume using your account by signing into your account and clicking the RECOVER MY ACCOUNT button. After this 30-day period and within 120 days all your account and personal data will be removed from our system. However, we may retain certain information as required by law or relating to important business needs, such as your prior transaction history for financial reporting purposes, as well as certain information to comply with law enforcement or court orders or other ongoing legal processes.
forgetMe.ReqDialogDesc2: To help us improve our services, please select a reason for your request:
forgetMe.ReqDialogDesc3: You may also submit a FORGET ME request by emailing help@ganjingworld.com

header.branding: "Gan Jing" means clean. Our mission is to promote kindness, respect, and trust among people. Our non-addictive algorithms prioritize meaningful information and content. We value freedom of speech and privacy, allowing users to download the app, share, and comment without registration.

text.campusSEODesc: Gan Jing Campus offers safe learning, teaching, and streaming. Enjoy courses, GJW+ kids series, and lessons on mobile, desktop, and TV, with free tools for teachers to create interactive class channels. Led by expert educators and powered by Gan Jing World’s mission to promote kindness and meaningful content.

text.limitationDesc: During the initial roll-out of this technology, the key-pair login is restricted to a per-device basis. You can only access your account from the device you used during the sign-up process. However, in future updates, we will enable this key-pair authentication across all devices.
text.whatDesc1: When you register for a new account, most websites will ask you to sign up with your email and then provide a password. These credentials can be stored either in the website owner's database or in a third-party authentication server such as Google.
text.whatDesc2: Instead of asking for your email and password, Gan Jing Browser allows users to register and login GanJingWorld.com (GJW) with an encrypted key-pair. No password is required, and no personal information is collected.
text.whatList1: When you sign up for GJW using Gan Jing Browser, a secure key-pair is generated for you. The private key is kept safely on your computer and never shared, while the public key is transmitted over the internet and stored by GJW.
text.whatList2: To log in to GJW, your device must present the private key to decrypt a security token issued by GJW, which is encrypted using the public key. Access to your public key by any unauthorized party does not pose a threat to your account, as they do not possess the required private key to complete the authentication.
text.whatList3: This key-pair authentication is a much safer way to access GJW because:
text.whatList3-1: The private key remains solely on your own device, minimizing the risk of unauthorized access.
text.whatList3-2: No personal information is exchanged during the process, preserving privacy.
text.whatList3-3: No need to remember a password, simplifying the login process.
text.whatListNote: We believe this new authentication method is the cornerstone of a secure internet in the future.
